title: Santa
alt: He probably just poops over the side of the sleigh.
transcript:
Megan: Say Santa eats a cookie at every few houses. That's hundreds of tons. By the end of the night, he should be a hulking seven-story behemoth.
But he's not.Cueball: What are you...
Megan: Does Santa poop in our houses?Cueball: No way.
Megan: That mass must be going somewhere.
Cueball: He has that magic bag...
Megan: You think he poops in the bag of presents?Cueball: Maybe instead of pooping in every few houses, he waits, and then in a few houses, he poops a lot.
Megan: What if no one's been that naughty?
Cueball: He picks at random. The needs of the many...
